channel.title: CVE Feed for Grafana -- Alloy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Grafana -- Alloy

item.title: CVE-2024-8975|2024-09-25T17:43:08.082Z -- grafana -- alloy
item.description: Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Grafana Alloy on Windows allows Privilege Escalation from Local User to SYSTEM This issue affects Alloy: before 1.3.3, from 1.4.0-rc.0 through 1.4.0-rc.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-8975|2024-09-25T16:42:09.998Z -- grafana -- alloy
item.description: Unquoted Search Path or Element vulnerability in Grafana Alloy on Windows allows Privilege Escalation from Local User to SYSTEM This issue affects Alloy: before 1.3.3, from 1.4.0-rc.0 through 1.4.0-rc.1.
